item.title: Fishing Skill Problem
item.dc:creator: @ballin2005 ballin2005
item.description:
@ballin2005 wrote:

Well after spending a while making a fishing spot Creating a spawn point at autospawn.cfg

spawn = 952	2854	3423	0	0	0	0	0	1	Static TUT FISHING SPOT

And adding is as an object in objects.cfg

object = 952	2854	3423	1

and then creating it to fish sharks in client.Java

} if (NPCID == 952) { if ((IsItemInBag(311) == true) && (actionTimer == 0)) { startFishing(313); } else { sendMessage("You need a " + getItemName(311) + " to fish here.");

Took me a while to figure it out but now it wont fish O.O its just another fishing spot sitting there, what can i do

Edit: currently looking at my clients files see if thereâ€™s something wrong there[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 15, 2008, 12:57:42 pm[/size][hr]anyone?
